message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI. 

The paper addresses the problem of scene text recognition, which involves computer vision (CV) and natural language processing (NLP) tasks. Therefore, cs.CV and cs.CL are the most likely sub-categories. The proposed method involves a scale attention network, which is a form of attention mechanism that is commonly used in deep learning models for various tasks, including CV and NLP. Therefore, cs.LG is also a likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the transfer learning aspect of the proposed method, which is a common topic in machine learning (ML) research. Therefore, cs.IR and cs.AI are also possible sub-categories.
